entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm across upper Richelieu. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
